dict.string: Increases the chance of finding a health globe by 25% and you gain 100% additional Life from health globes.

Critical hit chance increased by 5%. Critical hit damage increased by 50%.
Many skills and runestone effects rely on critical hits to trigger their effects.
Your Armor is increased by 100% of your Vitality.

Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Swords/Daggers: 15% increased damage Maces/Axes: 10% chance to critical hit Polearms/Spears: 10% attack speed Mighty Weapons: 3 Fury per hit
You inflict an additional 25% damage while at maximum Fury.

The duration of your shouts is doubled. After using a shout you regenerate 2% of your maximum Life per second for 60 seconds.
Your shouts are: Battle Rage Threatening Shout War Cry
Gain 3% of all damage done as Life.

Increases Fury generation by 20% and maximum Fury is increased by 20.
Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
Reduces all non-physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack you have a chance to gain 3 Fury.

Increases armor by 25%.
Thorns damage dealt increased by 50%.

Increases the damage of Ancient Spear and Weapon Throw by 10%. In addition, a critical hit with Ancient Spear automatically resets the cooldown and critical hits with Weapon Throw have a chance to return 14 Fury.
While below 20% Life, all skills cost no Fury and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
As long as there are 3 enemies within 8 yards, all of your damage is increased by 30%.
The duration of control impairing effects on you are reduced by 20%. In addition, whenever you become stunned, feared or charmed you have a chance to recover 15% of your maximum Life.
You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you gain 2 Fury every 1 seconds.
The cooldown on your Earthquake, Call of the Ancients and Wrath of the Berserker skills is reduced by 30 seconds.
Instead of Knockback, each hit has a 35% chance to Stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
Add 2 reverberations that cause 25% weapon damage per strike. Removes the chance for Knockback.
Increases the damage of your skills by 8% for 5 seconds after using Bash. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Cause a shockwave that inflicts 38% weapon damage to enemies in a 26 yard line behind the targeted enemy.
Brutally smash an enemy for 165% weapon damage with a 20% chance for Knockback.
Create a shockwave that deals 275% weapon damage to all enemies within 22 yards in front of you.
Strike a smaller area for 406% weapon damage.
Create a tremor at the point of impact for 2 seconds that slows the movement speed of enemies by 80%.
Whenever you kill an enemy with Hammer of the Ancients every other enemy within 10 yards is stunned for 3 seconds.
Critical Hits have a 10% chance to cause enemies to drop treasure or health globes.
Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 325% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 1% increased Critical Hit Chance for every 5 Fury that you have.
Enemies slain by Cleave explode, causing 85% weapon damage to all other enemies within 8 yards.
On Critical Hits, knock enemies back 9 yards and inflict 60% weapon damage to enemies where they land.
Increase damage to 175% weapon damage to enemies caught in the swing.
Enemies cleaved have their movement speed reduced by 80% for 1 seconds.
Swing your weapon in a wide arc to deal 140% weapon damage to all enemies caught in the swing.
Enemies in the area have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 3 seconds after they recover from being stunned.
Increase the area of effect to 24 yards. Enemies are pulled closer before the strike lands.
Enemies in the area also take 76% weapon damage.
Enemies are knocked back 9 yards and inflict 55% weapon damage to enemies in the landing area.
Smash the ground, stunning all enemies within 12 yards for 4 seconds.
Increase the range of Rend to hit all enemies within 17 yards.
Gain 9% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
Increase damage to 903% weapon damage as Physical every second for 5 seconds.
Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 60%.
Enemies killed while bleeding cause all enemies within 10 yards to begin bleeding for 100% weapon damage as Physical over 5 seconds.
A sweeping strike causes all nearby enemies to bleed for 700% weapon damage as Physical over 5 seconds.
Gain 100% additional Armor per enemy hit for 3 seconds after landing.
Jump into the air with such great force that enemies within 8 yards of the origin of the jump are also slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.
Send enemies hurtling away from where you land.
Shockwaves burst forth from the ground increasing the radius of effect to 16 yards and pulling affected enemies towards you.
Land with such force that enemies have a 100% chance to be stunned for 3 seconds.
Leap into the air, dealing 85% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards of your destination, slows enemies in the landing zone by 60% for 3 seconds.
Throw 3 spears. Each spear will pull back the enemy that it hits.
Gain Life equal to 60% of the damage inflicted.
Pierce through multiple enemies in a straight line and drag them all back.
Enemies hit with Ancient Spear are pulled in the opposite direction and damage is increased to 213% weapon damage.
Throw a spear to pull an enemy back to you, briefly slowing the target's movement by 60% and dealing 185% weapon damage, roots the target in place for 1.5. seconds.
Each strike has a 25% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 110% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
Killing an enemy with Frenzy heals you for 8% of your maximum Life over 6 seconds.
While under the effects of Frenzy, you gain 15% increased movement speed.
Add a 20% chance to call down a bolt of lightning from above, stunning your target for 1.5 seconds.
Each Frenzy effect also increases your damage by 4%.
Swing for 110% weapon damage. Frenzy attack speed increases by 15% with each swing. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
Add a 70% chance of stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Increase damage to 288% weapon damage and increases the knockback by 100%.
The ground continues to shudder after the intitial strike, damaging enemies in the area for 30% weapon damage.
Focus the seismic shockwaves along a narrow path to inflict 340% weapon damage to targets along a 42 yard path.
Slam the ground to cause a wave of destruction that deals 240% weapon damage and knockback to targets in a 45 yard arc.
Gain 5 Fury and heal for 8.0% of your maximum Life for each enemy hit.
After using Revenge, your critical strike chance is increased by 10% for 12 seconds.
Knocks enemies back 24 yards whenever Revenge is used.
Increases the chance Revenge will become active to 30% each time you are hit by an attack.

Revenge has a 15% chance to become active each time you are hit.
Inflict 220% weapon damage to all nearby enemies. You heal 5.0% of your maximum Life for each enemy hit.
Increase thrown weapon damage to 169% weapon damage.
Cause the weapon to ricochet and hit up to 3 targets within 20 yards of each other.
Hurl a hammer with a 50% chance to Stun the target for 2 seconds.
Aim for the head, gaining a 20% chance of causing your target to be Confused and attack other enemies for 6 seconds.
Expend all remaining Fury to throw a corpse which inflicts an additional 3% weapon damage for each point of Fury expended to all enemies within 12 yards of the target.
Hurl a throwing weapon at an enemy for 130% weapon damage and Slow the movement of the enemy by 60% for 2 seconds.
Increase dodge chance by 12% while sprinting.
Tornadoes rage in the wake of the Sprint, each one inflicting 60% weapon damage.
Increases the movement speed bonus to 50% for 5 seconds.
Slams through enemies, knocking them back and inflicting 25% weapon damage.
Increase the movement speed of allies within 50 yards by 20% for 3 seconds.
Increase movement speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 30%.
Affected enemies also have their attack speed reduced by 15% for 5 seconds.
Enemies are badly shaken and have a 15% chance to drop additional treasure or health globes.
Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 3 seconds.
Enemies are severely demoralized. Each enemy has a 35% chance to flee for 2.5 seconds.
Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 20% for 15 seconds.
Secondary tremors follow your movement and inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
Creates an icy patch causing Earthquake's damage to turn Cold and slow the movement of enemies by 80%.
Removes the Fury cost and reduces the cooldown to 105 seconds.
Secondary tremors knock enemies back and inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
Project secondary tremors up to 12 yards ahead of you that inflict 65% weapon damage as Fire.
Shake the ground violently, dealing 2000% weapon damage as Fire over 8 seconds to all enemies within 18 yards.
Generate harsh tornadoes that inflict 40% weapon damage to enemies in their path.
Increases your movement speed during Whirlwind to your full run speed.
Critical Hits restore 2% of your maximum Life.
Gain 1 Fury for every enemy struck.
Turns Whirlwind into a torrent of magma that inflicts 188% weapon damage as Fire.
Deliver multiple attacks to everything in your path for 145% weapon damage.
Increase damage at the destination to 283% weapon damage.
Cooldown is reduced by 2 second for every target hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 10 seconds.
Generate 8 additional Fury for each target hit while charging.
Any targets who are critically hit by Furious Charge will be stunned for 2.5 seconds.
Regain 8% of your maximum Life for each target hit by Furious Charge.
Rush forward knocking back enemies and inflicting 195% weapon damage to enemies along the path of the charge.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to increase the duration of Battle Rage by 2 seconds.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have up to a 5% chance to cause enemies to drop additional health globes.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to generate 15 additional Fury.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits have a chance to cause an explosion of blood dealing 20% of the damage done to all other nearby enemies.
Enter a rage which increases damage by 15% and critical hit chance by 3% for 120 seconds.
When activated, knockback all enemies within 12 yards and deal 50% weapon damage to them.
While Ignore Pain is active, gain 20% of all damage dealt as Life.
Extend the effect to nearby allies, reducing damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
Reflects 50% of ignored damage back at the enemy.
Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
The Ancients inflict 66% weapon damage with each attack and have 100% additional armor.
Korlic gains the skill Furious Charge which deals 200% of your weapon damage to all enemies in a line.
Madawc gains the skill Seismic Slam which deals 180% of your weapon damage to enemies in an arc.
Talic gains the skill Leap which deals 250% of your weapon damage to enemies in the area of the leap.

Summon the ancient barbarians Talic, Korlic, and Madawc to fight alongside you for 15 seconds. Each deals 60% weapon damage per swing in addition to bonus abilities.
Talic wields a sword and shield and uses the Whirlwind skill. Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses the Cleave skill. Madawc dual-wields axes and uses the Weapon Throw skill.
Throw up to 3 axes at nearby enemies which inflict 50% weapon damage each.
Your chance to Critical Hit is increased by 10% for 6 seconds.
Reflect 35% of incoming melee damage for 4 seconds after Overpower is activated.
Overpower generates 12 Fury for every enemy hit.
Heal 8% of your maximum Life for every enemy hit.
Deal 165% weapon damage to all targets within 9 yards. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to lower the cooldown by 1 second.
Increases maximum Life by 10% and regenerates 310 Life per second while affected by War Cry.
War Cry also grants 15% dodge bonus.
All of your resistances are increased by 20% while affected by War Cry.
Unleash a rallying cry to increase Armor for you and all allies within 50 yards by 20% for 60 seconds.
Activating Wrath of the Berserker knocks back all enemies within 12 yards and deals 430% weapon damage to them.
While active your damage is also increased by 100%.
Landing a critical hit while Wrath of the Berserker is active has a chance to cause an explosion of blood dealing 155% weapon damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
Increase the bonus dodge chance granted to 60%.
Every 25 Fury gained while Wrath of the Berserker is active adds 1 second to the duration of the effect.

Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.
Critical Hit: 10% Attack Speed: 25% Dodge Chance: 20% Movement Speed: 20%
Whenever you use Vault, Smoke Screen or backflip with Evasive Fire you gain 60% movement speed for 2 seconds.
Every 7 seconds, your next skill that costs Hatred will immobilize your target for 2 seconds.
Your maximum Hatred is increased by 25. In addition, gain 20 Hatred and 2 Discipline whenever you are healed by a health globe.
As long as there are no enemies within 10 yards, all damage is increased by 20%.
Damage against slowed enemies increased by 15%.

Critical hits have a chance to restore 1 Discipline.
Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
Gain 1% of your maximum Life per second.
Whenever you are at full Hatred, movement speed is increased by 15%.

Gain bonuses based on weapon held:
Bow: 15% increased damage Crossbows: 50% critical damage Hand Crossbows: 10% chance to critical hit
Enemies hit by Fan of Knives, Spike Trap, Caltrops, Grenades and Sentry fire have their damage reduced by 20% for 3 seconds.

Reduces the Discipline cost of all skills by 10%. Increases your Life, Armor and all of your resistances by 10%.
Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
The duration of your Caltrops, Marked for Death, Spike Trap and Sentry is increased by 100%. Increases the maximum number of Sentries to 3 and Spike Traps to 6.
Increases Hatred generated from Grenades by 2 and reduces the Hatred cost of Cluster Arrow by 10. Upon death, you drop a giant grenade that explodes for 450% weapon damage as Fire.
Gain a 3% chance to critical hit every second. This bonus is reset 1 second after you successfully critical hit.

Damage from rockets increased by 50%.
Rockets are fired from certain socketed skill effects.
Increase the chance for the arrow to pierce to 50%.
Light the arrow on fire, dealing 35% additional weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
If the arrow successfully pierces the first target, the arrow splits into 3 arrows.
Each consecutive pierce increases the damage of the arrow by 70%.
Successful critical hits cause a burst of bone to explode from the target, dealing 50% weapon damage to enemies in that area.
Fire a magically imbued arrow that seeks out targets for 115% weapon damage and has a 35% chance to pierce through targets.
Impale will knock the target back and 65% chance to stun them for 1.5 seconds.
Your target will also Bleed for 220% weapon damage as Physical over 2 seconds.
The knife will pierce through all enemies in a straight line.
After the intial throw, release multiple blades centered on you, dealing 75% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
Gain 100% additional damage to critical hits.
Impale a target for 265% weapon damage.
Strike targets with electrified chains that do an additional 70% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Increase the movement slow duration to 4 seconds.
Increase the Hatred generated to 6 per shot.
Gain 6% of the damage dealt as Life.
Imbue an arrow with shadow energy that deals 90% weapon damage and entangles up to 2 enemies, slowing their movement by 60% for 2 seconds.
When the trap is sprung, all enemies in the area are immobilized for 2 seconds.
Enemies in the area also take 45% weapon damage.
Become empowered while standing in the area of effect, gaining an additional 10% chance to critical hit with all attacks.
Lay a trap of caltrops on the ground that activates when an enemy approaches. Once sprung, the caltrops slow the movement of enemies within 12 yards by 60%. This trap lasts 6 seconds.
Reduces the initial Hatred cost to 5, and ignites your arrows, causing them to deal Fire damage.
Slows the movement of affected targets by 80% for 1 seconds.
While channeling Rapid Fire, launch 3 homing rockets every second. Each rocket deals 35% weapon damage as Physical to nearby targets.
Fire Poison arrows that have a 40% chance to pierce through enemies.
Rapidly fire grenades instead of arrows for 345% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within a 4 yard radius.
Rapidly fire for 276% weapon damage as Physical.
Increase the duration of the effect to 1.5 seconds.
While invisible you gain 6 Hatred per second.
Leave behind a cloud of gas that deals 700% weapon damage as Physical to enemies in the area over 5 seconds.
Vanish behind a wall of smoke, becoming momentarily invisible for 1 seconds.
As you travel, shoot 4 arrows for 75% weapon damage at nearby targets.
All enemies within 8 yards of your destination are knocked back and stunned for 1.5 seconds.
After using Vault, your next Vault within 6 seconds has its Discipline cost reduced by 50%.
Removes the Discipline cost but adds a 10 second cooldown.
Leave a trail of fire in your wake that inflicts 300% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Increase the explosion radius to 20 yards.
When the bola explodes, it deals 160% weapon damage as Lightning and has a 35% chance to stun the primary target for 1.5 seconds.
Shoot 3 bolas that deal 160% weapon damage as Poison each. The bolas no longer explode for area damage to nearby targets.
After the bola explodes, you have a 15% chance to gain 2 Discipline.
Augments the bola to deal 216% weapon damage as Arcane to the target and 154% weapon damage as Arcane to all other targets within 7 yards, but increases the explosion delay to 2 seconds.

Shoot out an explosive bola that wraps itself around its target. After 1 second, the bola explodes dealing 160% weapon damage as Fire to the target and an additional 110% weapon damage as Fire to all other targets within 14 yards.
A second Chakram mirrors the first. Each Chakram deals 114% weapon damage as Physical.
The Chakram follows a slow curve, dealing 230% weapon damage as Poison to enemies along the path.
The Chakram spirals out from the targeted location dealing 187% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies along the path.
The Chakram path turns into a loop, dealing 230% weapon damage as Lightning to enemies along the path.
Surround yourself with spinning Chakrams for 120 seconds, dealing 34% weapon damage per second as Physical to nearby enemies.
Fire a swirling Chakram that does 170% weapon damage as Physical to enemies along its path.
When activated, increases your maximum Discipline by 10 for 5 seconds.
Restore all Hatred for 25 Discipline. Preparation has no cooldown.
Gain 45 Discipline over 15 seconds instead of replenishing Discipline immediately.
There is a 30% chance that Preparation's cooldown will not be triggered.
Instead of backflipping, your Armor is increased by 25% for 3 seconds. This does not cost Discipline.
Whenever a backflip is triggered, leave a poison bomb behind that explodes for 55% weapon damage as Poison in a 12 yard radius after 0.6 seconds. Turns Evasive Fire into Poison damage.
Shoot a spread of bolts that hit up to 3 targets for 130% weapon damage each.
Increase the distance of the backflip to 30 yards.
Reduces the cost of the backflip to 2 Discipline. Turns Evasive Fire into Lightning damage.
Shoot for 130% weapon damage. If an enemy is in front of you at close range, you will also backflip away 15 yards.
Throw Cluster Grenades that deal 112% weapon damage as Fire over an 8 yard radius.
Throw a single grenade that deals 123% weapon damage as Fire.
Hurl grenades that have a 25% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
Throw gas grenades that explode for 95% weapon damage as Poison and leaves a cloud that deals an additional 25% weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds to enemies who stand in the area.
Throw out three grenades that explode for 95% weapon damage as Fire each.
Gain an additional 3 Hatred per second while Shadow Power is active.
Increases damage done as Life to 25%.
Reduce incoming damage by 35% while Shadow Power is active.
Gain 30% bonus to movement speed while Shadow Power is active.
Draw in the power of the shadows, gaining 15% of all damage done as Life for 5 seconds.
Summon a spider instead of a raven. The spider's attacks also Slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
Summon a bat instead of a raven. The bat grants you 3 Hatred per second.
Summon a boar instead of a raven. The boar increases your Life regeneration by 155 per second. In addition the boar increases your resistances to all damage types by 15%.
Summon ferrets instead of a raven. The ferrets collect gold for you and increase gold found on monsters by 10%.
Summon a wolf instead of a raven. The wolf attacks for 94% of your weapon damage as Physical.
Summon a raven companion. Your raven companion will periodically peck at enemies for 38% of your weapon damage as Physical.
Increase the slow amount to 80% for 2 seconds.
Surround yourself with whirling blades that deal 464% weapon damage to all enemies if you are struck in the next 10 seconds.
Increase the radius to damage all enemies within 20 yards.
Imbue your knives with a 65% chance to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
Throw long-range knives that deal 70% weapon damage to 5 additional targets.
Throw knives out in a spiral around you, doing 320% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards of you. Your knives will also slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
Leave a trail of fire in your wake that inflicts 65% weapon damage as Fire over 2 seconds.
Movement speed increased to 100% of normal running speed while strafing.
Throw out knives rather than arrows that do an extra 100% damage on successful critical hits.
In addition to regular firing, fire off homing rockets for 60% weapon damage as Fire.
Throw out bouncy grenades that explode for 187% weapon damage to targets within 9 yards.
Shoot at random nearby enemies for 156% weapon damage while moving at 75% of normal movement speed.
Fire a slow moving arrow that electrocutes enemies along its path for 155% weapon damage as Lightning.
Fire a Frost arrow that splits into multiple arrows after hitting its target, dealing 170% weapon damage as Cold. Affected enemies have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 1 second.
Grants a 40% chance to shoot a skull that will fear affected enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Fire electrified bolts that stun enemies for 1.5 seconds when they critically hit.
Unleash shadow tentacles that deal 155% weapon damage and return 3% of damage dealt as Life for you.
Shoot an elemental charged arrow that deals 155% weapon damage as Fire to all targets it passes through.
When the target is killed, the ability spreads to 2 other nearby targets. This effect can chain repeatedly.
Mark an area on the ground 12 yards wide for 15 seconds. Enemies in the area take 12% additional damage.
An additional 12% of damage done to the target is also divided among all enemies within 20 yards.
Attacks you make against the marked target generate 3 Hatred.
Heal attackers for 1% of the damage done to the marked target.
Marks an enemy. The marked enemy will take 12% additional damage for the next 30 seconds.
Cost reduced to 15 Hatred. Deals 165% weapon damage as Lightning.
Every time you fire, generate a shock pulse that damages nearby enemies for 65% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the damage of Multishot to 214% weapon damage.
Every use also fires 3 rockets at nearby enemies that deal 60% weapon damage as Fire each.
Fire a massive volley of arrows dealing 165% weapon damage to all enemies in the area.
Your Spike Traps can explode up to 3 times, dealing 275% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards each time.
Plant a bomb on an enemy rather than on the ground. If the target dies within 30 seconds, the bomb explodes dealing 404% weapon damage to all enemies within 16 yards.
Increases the arming time to 2 seconds but increases damage to 371% weapon damage.
When the trap is triggered it releases a pulse of lightning that will bounce to up to 3 enemies for 275% weapon damage as Lightning.
Simultaneously place all 3 traps at once.

Lay a trap that arms after 1.2 seconds and triggers when an enemy approaches. The trap does 275% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
You can have a maximum of 3 Spike Traps active at one time.
The turret will also fire homing rockets aimed at random nearby targets for 30% weapon damage as Fire.
Reduces the cooldown of Sentry to 6 seconds.
Create a tether between you and the Sentry that does 125% weapon damage every second to every enemy it touches.
Heals nearby allies for 1.0% of their maximum Life per second.
The turret also creates a shield that reduces damage taken by allies by 15%.
Drop a turret on the ground. The turret begins firing at nearby enemies for 175% weapon damage. Lasts 30 seconds. You may have 2 turrets active at a time.
Enemies hit by grenades have a 55% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
Instead of releasing grenades, shoots up to 3 rockets at nearby enemies dealing 175% weapon damage as Physical each.
Instead of releasing grenades, the cluster releases shadow energy that deals 165% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies. You will gain 4% of the damage done as Life.
Launch the cluster through the air, dropping a series of bombs in a straight line that explode for 230% weapon damage as Fire each.
Increases the damage of the explosion at the impact location to 304% weapon damage as Fire.
Fire a cluster arrow that explodes for 225% weapon damage as Fire into a series of additional miniature bombs that explode for 100% weapon damage as Fire each.
Launch a massive volley of guided arrows that rain down on enemies for 792% weapon damage over 12 seconds.
Summon 20 Shadow Beasts to drop bombs on enemies, dealing 245% weapon damage each.
Summon a wave of 10 Shadow Beasts to tear across the ground, knocking back enemies and dealing 120% weapon damage each.
Summon a Shadow Beast that drops grenades from the sky over 15 seconds dealing 3300% weapon damage.
A group of 8 Shadow Beasts plummet from the sky at a targeted location dealing 100% weapon damage each and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
Fire a massive volley of arrows around you. Arrows fall from the sky dealing 715% weapon damage over 5 seconds to all enemies in the area.
Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

Increases maximum Spirit by 100, generates 1 Spirit per second.
Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
Every point of Spirit spent heals you for 62 Life.
Duration of all Mantras increased by 7 minutes. While one of your Mantras is active you gain 2 Spirit every second.
Your Armor is increased by 50% of your Dexterity.
While dual-wielding, you gain a 15% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 35%.
Your dodge chance is increased by an amount equal to 30% of your chance to critical hit.
While you are under a Stun, Fear, Immobilize or Charm effect, all damage taken is reduced by 75%.
Whenever you use a direct heal skill on another player you and the other player deal 16% more damage for 15 seconds.
Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.
Each different Spirit Generator ability you use increases your damage by 8% for 3 seconds.

When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 35% of maximum Life and 35% Spirit.
This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
Teleport to the target and releases an electric shockwave with each punch that hits all enemies within 6 yards of your primary target for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.
Fists of Thunder increases your Dodge chance by 16% for 2 seconds.
Your primary target is charged with static for 5 seconds. Enemies with a static charge take 37% weapon damage as Lightning when you attack other nearby enemies with Fists of Thunder.
Critical Hits generate an additional 15 Spirit.
Every third punch releases chain lighting instead of knocking enemies back. Each lightning strike inflicts 73% weapon damage as Lightning.

Unleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 110% weapon damage as Lightning. Every third hit deals damage to all enemies in front of you and knocks them back a short distance. Generates Spirit faster than other Spirit-generating skills due to the high attack speed.
With a torrent of fire, strike all nearby enemies for 258% weapon damage as Fire and knock them back.
Increases Knockback distance by 150% and slows the movement speed of struck enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
Hurl a column of fire that pierces through enemies, causing 294% weapon damage as Fire to each enemy it strikes.
Enemies have a 50% chance to be stunned for 1.5 seconds instead of being knocked back.
Attack enemies at long range and slow the movement speed of affected targets by 80% for 2 seconds.
Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick, knocking enemies back and dealing 235% weapon damage.
The second and third strike of the skill have an increased area of effect.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the armor of the Monk by 50% for 4 seconds.
The third strike is replaced with an attack that will hit up to 6 nearby enemies within 15 yards for 170% weapon damage as Lightning.
Critical hits with this skill generate 10 Spirit.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the damage of all attacks by 18% for 30 seconds.
Project lines of pure force over a short distance for 110% weapon damage. Every third hit extends out 25 yards.
Increases the duration enemies are blinded to 4 seconds.
Blinded enemies have a 25% chance to attack each other.
6 seconds after using Blinding Flash, a second flash of light will blind enemies within 20 yards for 0.5 seconds.
Increases the chance Elite monsters will miss attacks to 60%.
For 3 seconds after using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks are empowered to deal 30% additional weapon damage as Holy.
Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite monsters will recover early but will suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
Reduces the channeling cost of Tempest Rush to 8 Spirit.
Increases the movement speed of Tempest Rush by 25%.
Increases the potency of the hobbling effect, slowing enemy movement by 80%.
Reduce the damage taken while running by 25%.
Enemies knocked back have their damage reduced by 20% for the duration of the effect.
Charge directly through your enemies, knocking them back and hobbling them, slowing their movement by 60% for 2 seconds. Also deals 85% weapon damage while running.
Breath of Heaven also sears enemies for 80% weapon damage as Holy.
Increases the healing power of Breath of Heaven to 8063 - 9675 Life.
Breath of Heaven increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for 45 seconds.
Gain 8 additional Spirit from Spirit generating attacks for 5 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.
Enemies exposed to Breath of Heaven run away in fear for 1.5 seconds.
A blast of divine energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 6202 - 7442 Life.
After striking an enemy, your movement speed is increased 25% for 3 seconds.
Perform a flying kick that has a 60% chance to Stun your target for 1.5 seconds.
Reduces the cost of Dashing Strike to 10 Spirit.
Launch yourself through the air and slow all enemies along your path by 60% for 2 seconds.
Receive a 20% increased chance to dodge for 3 seconds.
Dash quickly at the targeted enemy or location, dealing 160% weapon damage and rooting the target for 1 second.
Enemies hit by Crippling Wave inflict 20% less damage for 3 seconds.
The range of Crippling Wave's third strike is increased to 17 yards and the effect of the movement speed reduction is increased to 60%.
Enemies hit by Crippling Wave take 10% additional damage from all attacks for 3 seconds.

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that cause 110% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you. Every third hit damages all enemies around you and dazes them, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
Increases damage of the initial impact to 566% weapon damage as Holy.
Shoot out bursts of energy that deal 430% weapon damage as Holy to nearby enemies.
Reduces the cost of Wave of Light to 40 Spirit.
Critical hits stun enemies for 3 seconds.
Summon an ancient pillar that deals 280% weapon damage followed by an additional 210% weapon damage after 2 seconds.
Focuses a wave of light that crushes enemies for 390% weapon damage as Holy, followed by an additional 45% weapon damage as Holy to all enemies in a line.
Also causes the target to take 12% additional damage for 3 seconds.
If the target explodes after bleeding, gain 5 Spirit for each enemy caught in the blast.
Also reduces your target's movement speed by 80%.
Increases the duration of the Bleed effect to deal 220% weapon damage as Physical over 15 seconds.

Instead of bleeding, the target will burn for 250% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds. If the target dies while burning, it explodes causing all nearby enemies to burn for 60% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds. This effect can happen multiple times.

Cause a target to Bleed for 745% weapon damage as Physical over 9 seconds. If the target dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 30% of the target's maximum Life as Physical damage to all nearby enemies.
Reduces the Spirit cost of Cyclone Strike to 30 Spirit.
Increases the distance enemies will be pulled to 34 yards.
Changes the blast into an explosion of fire that has a 35% chance to Fear enemies for 1.5 seconds.
After using Cyclone Strike gain a 20% chance to dodge attacks for 3 seconds.
Cyclone Strike heals you and all allies within 24 yards for 1240 Life.
Pull all enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 100% weapon damage as Holy.
Increase the number of hits in the second strike from 7 to 10.
Critical hits increase your attack speed and movement speed by 5% for 5 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Affected targets will take an additional 100% weapon damage per second as Holy over 5 seconds. Also enables the first hit to dash a short distance.
Every activation of the skill has a 15% chance to generate 15 additional Spirit.
The third strike generates a wave of wind that deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to enemies directly ahead of you.
Unleash a rapid series of punches that strikes enemies for 140% weapon damage.
When activated, Serenity heals you for 6202 - 7752 Life.
When Serenity ends, the shield explodes, dealing 30% of the damage absorbed by Serenity as Holy damage to enemies within 20 yards. The damage to each enemy cannot exceed 100% of your maximum Life.
Extends the protective shield to allies within 45 yards for 1 seconds, and makes them immune to control impairing effects like Slow and Frozen.
Increases the duration of Serenity to 4 seconds.
While Serenity is active, 50% of all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.
You are enveloped in a protective shield that absorbs all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.
Teleport to the target and increases damage done to 2309% weapon damage over 7 hits.
Increases the number of strikes made to 9 attacks.
Enemies hit by the barrage have a 25% chance per hit to be charmed or stunned for 7 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike by 7 seconds.
Each strike explodes, dealing 254% weapon damage as Holy in a 7 yard radius around the target.
Dash rapidly between nearby enemies dealing 1777% weapon damage over 7 hits.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in armor by 20%.

When you or an ally under the effect of Mantra of Evasion is reduced below 25% Life, a shield of protection forms around that target, reducing damage taken by 80% for 3 seconds.
Each target can be protected at most once every 90 seconds by this effect.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in movement speed by 8%.
Mantra of Evasion also reduces the duration of all control impairing effects by 20%.
Successfully dodging an attack has a chance to create a burst of flame dealing 35% weapon damage as Fire to all nearby enemies.

ecite a Mantra that grants you and all allies within 40 yards a 15% chance to dodge attacks. Lasts 3 minutes.
For 3 seconds after activation, a second effect grants an additional 15% chance to dodge attacks.
This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Increase amount of damage reflected by the Mantra to 60%. The Mantra will now reflect ranged damage as well as melee damage.
Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed for you and all allies by 8%.
When taking damage from the Mantra of Retribution, enemies have a 10% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
When reflecting damage done to you, Mantra of Retribution has a chance to restore 3 Spirit.
An attacker that triggers Mantra of Retribution has up to a 30% chance to suffer a feedback blast, dealing 45% weapon damage as Holy to itself and surrounding enemies.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to reflect melee damage back at enemies, dealing Holy damage equal to 40% of the damage sustained. Lasts 3 minutes.
For 3 seconds after activation the effect on you is increased to 80% of the damage sustained.
This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Increases the duration of the vortex to 20 seconds.
Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage per stack to 20% weapon damage. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 60% weapon damage.
Increases the radius of the vortex to 14 yards and modifies the damage dealt to Fire.
As long as your vortex is at the maximum stack count, you gain 3 Spirit per second.

While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, Critical Hits have a chance to spawn a lightning tornado that periodically electrocutes nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage as Lightning. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.

Surround yourself in a vortex that continuously deals 15% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards. The vortex lasts 6 seconds and is refreshed each time you strike an enemy with a melee attack. Landing a Critical Hit has a chance to increase the vortex effect up to 2 times for a total of 45% weapon damage to nearby enemies.
You and your allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary regenerate 1550 Life per second.
When Inner Sanctuary expires it becomes Sanctified Ground for 6 seconds, slowing the movement of all enemies on it by 60%.
Increase the duration of Inner Sanctuary to 7 seconds.
Allies, including yourself, standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary take 35% less damage.
You and your allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary deal 10% additional damage.
Create a circle of protection on the ground for 5 seconds that cannot be passed by enemies.

Imbue the ally with the essence of water. The ally gains the ability to perform a wave attack that deals 120% of your weapon damage as Physical and slows the movement of affected targets by 30% for 2 seconds.

Imbue the ally with the essence of fire. The ally gains the ability to fire kick for 80% weapon damage as Fire plus an additional 40% of your weapon damage per second as Fire for 2 seconds to all enemies in a straight line.

Imbue the ally with the essence of air. Every attack made by the ally has a 2% chance to generate 100 Spirit for you. In addition, the ally is surrounded in a torrent of wind that deals 10% of your weapon damage per second as Physical to all nearby enemies.

Imbue the ally with the essence of life. When the ally dies it has a 50% chance to be reborn after 5 seconds. In addition, the physical damage of the ally's basic attack is increased to 44% of your weapon damage per swing.

Imbue the ally with the essence of earth. Maximum Life for you and the ally is increased by 10%. The ally also gains the ability to create a wave of earth, dealing 60% of your weapon damage as Physical to a single enemy and forcing that enemy to attack the ally for 3 seconds.
Summon an elemental ally capable of engaging enemies in combat until it is destroyed. The ally deals 40% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
Increases the Life regeneration granted by Mantra of Healing to 620 Life per second.
Mantra of Healing also grants you 3 Spirit per second.
Mantra of Healing shrouds you and your allies with a mystical shield for 2 seconds that absorbs up to 15% of each person's maximum Life in damage.
Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality by 10%.
Mantra of Healing also increases all resistances by 20%.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to gain increased Life regeneration by 310 Life per second. Lasts 3 minutes.
For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 1240.4 Life per second.
This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Increases Mantra strength so that enemies take 24% additional damage and 48% for the first 3 seconds.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction inflict 10% less damage.
Slows the movement of enemies within 20 yards by 30%.
You and your allies have a 30% chance to be healed for 279 - 341 Life when using melee attacks on an enemy under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction take 12% weapon damage per second as Holy.

Recite a Mantra that causes all enemies within 20 yards of you to take 12% additional damage. Lasts 3 minutes.
For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 24% additional damage.
This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Whenever an enemy dies within 12 yards, there is a 30% chance that a Zombie Dog will automatically emerge. The range of this effect is increased by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
Reduces all damage taken by you and your pets by 15%.

Maximum Mana is increased by 20%. Regenerate 1% of your maximum Mana per second.
Mana is the fuel you use to cast offensive and defensive skills.
Whenever you are healed by a health globe gain 10% of your maximum Mana and 10% Intelligence for 10 seconds. The Intelligence bonus can stack up to 5 times.
Whenever you deal Poison damage to an enemy, their damage is reduced by 20% for 3 seconds.
15% of Mana costs are paid with Life. In addition, you regenerate 1% of your maximum Life per second.
You can have 4 Zombie Dogs out at once. The health of your Zombie Dogs and Gargantuan is increased by 20%.
All of your damage is increased by 20% but your Mana costs are increased by 30%.

Whenever you cast a physical realm spell, you have a 5% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.
Physical realm spells are: Poison Dart Plague of Toads Zombie Charger Corpse Spiders Firebats Firebomb Locust Swarm Acid Cloud Wall of Zombies

Reduces the cooldown of your Horrify, Spirit Walk, and Soul Harvest spells by 2 seconds. In addition, the next time you receive fatal damage, you automatically enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds and heal to 15% of your maximum Life. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
Returns a flat amount of Mana over 10 seconds (49 Mana at level 60).
Grants 30% increased Mana regeneration for 5 seconds after doing damage with Corpse Spiders, Firebomb, Plague of Toads, or Poison Dart.
All your pets get 100% of the benefit of your Thorns and Life regeneration items.

Whenever an enemy dies within 8 yards, regain 2% of your maximum Life and Mana and the cooldown on all of your abilities is reduced by 1 second. This range is extended by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
The cooldowns of your Fetish Army, Big Bad Voodoo, Hex abilities, Gargantuan, Mass Confusion, and Summon Zombie Dogs are reduced by 25%.
Shoot 3 darts at once that deal 60% weapon damage as Poison each.
Toxins in the dart cause the target to move slower by 60% for 2 seconds.
Gain 29 Mana every time a dart hits a target.
Ignite the dart, allowing it to deal a full 180% weapon damage as Fire at once.
Transform your dart into a snake that has a 30% chance to stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
Shoot a deadly poison dart that deals 100% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.
Increases the damage done to 26% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Enemies who die while in the area of Grasp of the Dead have a 10% chance to produce health globe or summon a Zombie Dog.
Corpses fall from the sky, dealing 80% weapon damage as Physical over 8 seconds to nearby enemies.
Ghoulish hands reach out from the ground, slowing enemy movement by 60% and dealing 320% weapon damage as Physical over 8 seconds.
Summon jumping spiders that leap up to 25 yards to reach their target and attack for 19% weapon damage as Physical.
Summon a spider queen that births spiderlings, dealing 630% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area over 15 seconds. You may only have one spider queen summoned at a time.
Summon widowmaker spiders that return 3 Mana to you per hit.
Summon paralyzing spiders that have a 25% chance to slow enemies' movement by 60% with every attack.
Summon fire spiders that deal 21% weapon damage as Fire.
Summon 4 spiders to attack nearby enemies for 16% weapon damage as Physical.
Your summoned zombie dogs gain an infectious bite that deals 9% of your weapon damage over 3 seconds.
Upon death, your Zombie Dogs have a 15% chance of leaving behind a health globe.
10% of damage done to you is absorbed by your zombie dogs instead.
Your Zombie Dogs burst into flames, burning nearby enemies for 2% of your weapon damage as Fire.
Your Zombie Dogs gain 50% of damage dealt as Life, half of which heals you.
Summon 3 zombie dogs from the depths to fight by your side. Each dog deals 9% of your weapon damage as Physical per hit.
Summon fewer but larger bats that travel up to 40 yards and hit for 220% weapon damage as Fire.
2.5% of damage done by the bats is gained as Life.
Diseased bats fly towards the enemy and infect them. Damage is slow at first, but can increase over time to a maximum of 270% weapon damage as Poison.
Rapidly summon bats to seek out nearby targets for 350% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Call forth a swirl of bats to damage nearby enemies for 195% weapon damage as Fire. The damage of the bats increases by 20% every second, up to a maximum of 100%.
Call forth a swarm of fiery bats to burn enemies in front of you for 180% weapon damage as Fire.
Increases the duration of the fear to 6 seconds.
Gain 20% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after cast.
Increases the radius of the effect to 24 yards.
Gain 100% additional armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
Gain 27 Mana for every feared enemy.
Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 12 yards, causing them to run in fear for 4 seconds.
Gain 39 Mana for every affected enemy.
Gain 2171 Life for every affected enemy.
Reduces the movement speed of enemies by 80% for 3 seconds.
Increases duration of the effect to 60 seconds.
Affected enemies also take 230% weapon damage as Physical.
Feed on the life force of up to 5 enemies within 16 yards. Gain 130 Intelligence for each affected enemy. This effect lasts 30 seconds.
Mutate to Fire bullfrogs that explode for 169% weapon damage as Fire.
Summon a giant toad that swallows enemies whole for up to 5 seconds, digesting for 20% of your weapon damage per second as Physical. Adds a 5 second cooldown to Plague of Toads.
Cause toads to rain from the sky that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area over 2 seconds.
Mutate to yellow frogs that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison and have a 15% chance to Confuse affected enemies for 4 seconds.
Removes the Mana cost of Plague of Toads.
Release a handful of toads that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison to enemies they come in contact with.
The spirit returns 155 Life per second.
Summon a vengeful spirit that does 383% weapon damage as Arcane over 2 seconds.
If there are no targets left the spirit will linger for up to 10 seconds looking for new targets.
Slows the movement of haunted targets by 30%.
The spirit returns 10.2 Mana per second.
Haunt an enemy with a spirit, dealing 575% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will haunt another nearby enemy.
Ichor errupts from the corpses of the Zombie Dogs that slows enemies by 60% for 8 seconds.
Each sacrificed dog has a 35% chance to resurrect as a new zombie dog.
Regain 294 Mana for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.
Gain 6202 Life for each Zombie Dog you sacrifice.
Each sacrificed Zombie Dog increases your damage by 5% for 30 seconds.
All of your zombie dogs explode, each dealing 275% of your weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
The Zombie Charger leaves behind a cloud of noxious vapors that deals 240% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds to enemies caught in it.
If the Zombie Charger kills any enemies it will reanimate and charge nearby enemies for 205% weapon damage as Poison. This effect can repeat up to 2 times.
Summon 3 zombie chargers that each deal 115% weapon damage as Poison.
Summon an explosive Zombie Dog that streaks toward your target before exploding, dealing 236% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 9 yards.
Summon zombie bears that stampede towards your target. Each one deals 236% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
Call forth a reckless, suicidal zombie that deals 205% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies in its way.
Increases the duration of Spirit Walk to 3 seconds.
Gain 15% of your maximum Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.
When Spirit Walk ends, your physical body erupts for 310% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 10 yards.
Enemies you walk through in spirit form take 450% weapon damage as Physical over 2 seconds.
Gain 7% of your maximum Life every second while Spirit Walk is active.

Enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered.
Your link to the spirit realm will end if you cast any spell or your physical body sustains 50% of your maximum Life in damage.
Gain 44 Mana every time Spirit Barrage hits.
Fire an additional 3 spirits that seek out other targets and deal 65% weapon damage as Physical.
Summons a spectre for 5 seconds that deals 45% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 10 yards.
Regain 3% of damage dealt as Life.
Summon a spectre for 20 seconds that hovers over you, unleashing spirit bolts at nearby enemies for 1667% weapon damage as Physical over 20 seconds.
Bombard a target with a spirit blast that deals 230% weapon damage as Physical.
Gargantuan gains a Cleave ability allowing its attacks to hit multiple targets for 130% of your weapon damage as Physical.

When the Gargantuan encounters an elite enemy or is near 5 enemies, it enrages for 15 seconds gaining:
20% movement speed 35% attack speed 200% Physical damage
This effect cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds. Elite enemies include champions, rares, bosses, and other players.
Summon a more powerful Gargantuan that only lasts for 15 seconds. The Gargantuan's fists burn with fire, dealing 110% of your weapon damage as Fire and knocking enemies back.
The Gargantuan is surrounded by a poison cloud that deals 15% weapon damage as Poison per second to nearby enemies.
The Gargantuan gains the ability to the periodically slam enemies, dealing 200% of your weapon damage as Physical and stunning them for 3 seconds.
Summon a large zombie follower to fight for you. The Gargantuan attacks for 100% of your weapon damage as Physical damage with every swing.
Rather than exploding for area damage, each Firebomb can bounce to up to 6 additional targets. Damage is reduced by 15% per bounce.
Allows the skull to bounce up to 2 times.
The explosion creates a pool of fire that deals 36% weapon damage per second as Fire over 3 seconds.
Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy for 640% weapon damage as Fire over 6 seconds.
In addition to the base explosion, the skull creates a larger blast that deals an additional 20% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 28 yards.
Lob an explosive skull that deals 110% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 8 yards.
The locust swarm has a 100% chance to jump to two targets instead of one.
Gain 37 Mana for every enemy affected.
Increase the duration of the swarm to 10 seconds.
Enemies killed by the Locust Swarm leave behind a cloud of locusts that deal 25% weapon damage as Poison. This cloud of locusts lingers for 3 seconds.
Engulf the target with burning locusts that deal 468% weapon damage as Fire over 8 seconds.
Unleash a plague of locusts that swarms an enemy, dealing 360% weapon damage as Poison over 8 seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby enemies.
The initial splash is increased to 24 yards.

Increases base damage of Acid Cloud to 115% weapon damage the acid on the ground forms into a slime that irradiates nearby enemies for 50% weapon damage as Poison. The slime will survive for 5 seconds before dissipating.
Increases base damage of Acid Cloud to 115% weapon damage and deals additional 300% weapon damage over 6 seconds
Spit a cloud of acid that inflicts 126% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 165% weapon damage as Poison to enemies who remain in the area over 3 seconds.
Raise a corpse from the ground that explodes for 230% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
Cause acid to rain down, dealing an initial 115% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 150% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds to enemies who remain in the area.
The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal friendly targets for 1861 Life.
Transform into an angry chicken for up to 5 seconds that can explode for 215% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
Hex causes the target to Bleed for 12% weapon damage as Physical.
Hexed targets explode when killed dealing 135% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summon a Fetish Shaman for 12 seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and take 10% additional damage.
Enemies killed while Confused have a 50% chance of spawning a Zombie Dog.
Up to 6 monsters who aren't confused will be stunned for 3 seconds.
All enemies in the area take 20% additional damage for 12 seconds.
Amid the confusion, a giant spirit rampages through enemies, dealing 22% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies it passes through.
Incite paranoia in enemies, confusing them and causing some to fight for you for 12 seconds.
Increases the duration of the ritual to 30 seconds.
The ritual restores 122 Mana per second while standing in the ritual area.
Increase the damage of all allies in the area by 30%.
Heal all allies in the area for 5% of their maximum Life per second.
Enemies who die in the ritual area have a 50% chance to resurrect as a Zombie Dog.
Conjure a Fetish that begins a ritual dance that increases the attack speed and movement speed of all nearby allies by 20% for 20 seconds.
Increases the width of the Wall of Zombies. The zombies will attack for 80% weapon damage as Physical.
Your Wall of Zombies will Slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 5 seconds.
Up to 3 zombies will emerge entirely from the ground and attack nearby enemies for 25% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
Summon a tower of zombies that falls over, dealing 550% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies it hits and knocks them back. Reduces the cooldown to 10 seconds.
Zombies crawl out of the ground and run in all directions, dealing 445% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
Raise a line of zombies from the ground that attacks nearby enemies for 800% weapon damage as Physical over 5 seconds.
Each Fetish deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to any enemy near it as they appear.
Increases number of dagger-wielding Fetishes summoned by 3.
Adds 2 Fetish casters to the army. The casters breathe fire that deals 15% of your weapon damage as Fire in a cone in front of them.
Adds 2 Hunter Fetishes to the army. Hunter Fetishes shoot blowdarts at enemies dealing 20% of your weapon damage as Poison.
Summon an army of Fetish creatures to fight by your side for 20 seconds. Dagger-wielding Fetishes attack for 20% of your weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.
Increases all damage done by 15% but decreases armor and resistances by 10%.

When you deal damage with a Signature spell, you gain 4 Arcane Power.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.
Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit, the cooldowns on Mirror Image and Teleport are automatically reset.
Cold damage dealt to chilled and frozen targets is increased by 20%.
Fire damage dealt to enemies applies a burning effect, increasing all damage done to them by 10% for 3 seconds.
Lightning damage dealt to enemies has up to a 8% chance to Stun the target for 2 seconds.

Increases the duration of your Armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 310 Life per second.
The following skills are improved: Energy Armor Ice Armor Storm Armor
Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
Critical Hits have a chance to reduce the cooldown of your spells by 1 second.

When you deal damage with a Signature spell you may gain a Flash of Insight. After 5 Flashes of Insight, your next non-Signature spell deals 75% additional damage.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute

When reduced below 30% Life, you heal to 45% of your maximum Life and release a shockwave that knocks enemies back and slows them by 60% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
Increases the damage of Magic Missile to 163% weapon damage as Arcane.
Fire 3 missiles that each deal 56% weapon damage as Arcane.
Missiles have a 100% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional enemies.
Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 4 Arcane Power.
Missiles track the nearest enemy and their damage is increased to 138% weapon damage as Arcane.

This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.
Launch a missile of magic energy, causing 125% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the amount the target's movement is slowed to 80% for 4 seconds.
Using continuously on a single target increases damage over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 280% weapon damage as Cold.
Reduce casting cost to 10 Arcane Power.
Create a swirling storm around you, dealing 280% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies caught within it.
Enemies killed with Ray of Frost leave behind a patch of ice that deals 387% weapon damage as Cold to enemies moving through it over 3 seconds.
Project a beam of frozen ice that blasts 215% weapon damage as Cold to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 60% for 4 seconds.
Slain enemies explode, dealing 70% weapon damage as Lightning to every enemy within 10 yards.
Cast bolts of fire that each deal 152% weapon damage as Fire.
Merge the bolts in a a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 105% weapon damage as Lightning to everything it hits.
Every target hit by a pulse restores 3 Arcane Power.
Conjure a being of lightning that drifts forward, electrocuting nearby enemies for 37% weapon damage as Lightning.

This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.
Release a medium range pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 105% weapon damage as Lightning.
A frozen enemy that is killed has a 50% chance of releasing another Frost Nova.
The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost dealing that deals 160% weapon damage as Cold over 8 seconds.
If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain 15% chance to critically hit for 12 seconds.
Enemies take 15% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.
An explosion of ice freezes nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
Increase the damage of the explosion to deal 228% weapon damage as Arcane.
Create 4 Arcane Orbs that orbit you, exploding for 70% weapon damage as Arcane when enemies get close.
Modify the orb to deal 175% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 20 yards.
Reduce casting cost to 20 Arcane Power.
The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through.
Hurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 175% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.
Increases the maximum amount of damage absorbed to 21707 damage.
Reduces Arcane Power cost of all spells by 7 while Diamond Skin is active.
Reflects 100% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.
When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards will explode in all directions dealing 210% weapon damage as Physical to enemies nearby.
Transform your skin to diamond for 6 seconds, absorbing up to 10853 damage from incoming attacks.
Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and stuns all affected enemies for 2 seconds.
Reduce casting cost to 15 Arcane Power and cooldown is reduced to 9 seconds.
Increases damage to 260% weapon damage as Physical, but reduces Knockback.
Enemies caught in the wave have a 100% chance to be randomly teleported.
Enemies hit have a 40% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that deals 100% weapon damage as Physical and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.
Discharge a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 60% and deals 200% weapon damage as Physical.
Enemies hit by the blade will Bleed for an additional 45% weapon damage over 3 seconds.
Slow the movement speed of enemies by 80% for 1 second .
Every enemy hit grants 3 Arcane Power.
Whenever the blades do damage, you are healed for 5% of the damage done.
Extends the reach of Spectral Blade to 20 yards.

This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.
Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path for 165% weapon damage.
Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become Disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 15% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.
Unleash a torrent of power beyond your control. You no longer direct where the projectiles go, but their damage is increased to 670% weapon damage as Arcane.

Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 2 seconds. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 180% weapon damage as Arcane. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
Every missile hit has a 2% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.
Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 100% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 210% weapon damage as Arcane.
Hurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 210% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies near the impact location.
Reduce casting cost to 20 Arcane Power.
Increases the damage of Energy Twister to 468% weapon damage as Arcane.
When two Energy Twisters collide, they merge into a tornado with increased area of effect that causes 360% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds.
Twisters no longer travel but spin in place, dealing 252% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything caught in them.

Casting Energy Twister grants you a Wind Charge. You can store up to 3 Wind Charges at a time. Casting a Signature spell releases all Wind Charges as a giant Energy Twister that deals 75% weapon damage as Arcane per Wind Charge.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 360% weapon damage as Arcane over 6 seconds to everything in its path.
Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement speed by 30%.
Crystallize Whenever you are struck by a melee attack, your Armor is increased by 20% for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Melee attackers also take 130% weapon damage as Cold.
Melee attacks have a 25% chance to create a Frost Nova centered on the attacker, dealing 75% weapon damage as Cold.
A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 30% weapon damage as Cold over 3 seconds after casting Ice Armor.

Surround yourself in a barrier of ice that reduces damage from melee attacks by 12%. Melee attackers are either Chilled or Frozen for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Increases the maximum number of enemies that can be electrocuted to 6.
Critical Hits release 4 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 55% weapon damage as Lightning to any targets hit.
Create streaks of lightning that pierce through targets, hitting all enemies for 86% weapon damage as Lightning.
Gain 1 Arcane Power for every enemy hit by Electrocute.
Blast a cone of lightning that causes 115% weapon damage as Lightning to all affected targets.

This is a Signature spell. Signature spells are free to cast.
Lightning arcs from your fingertips, dealing 90% weapon damage as Lightning. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 additional enemies.
Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 3 seconds after they have left the bubble.
Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 20% more damage.
Increases the potency of the movement speed reduction to 80%.
Reduces the cooldown of Slow Time to 12 seconds.
Time is sped up for any allies standing in the area, increasing their attack speed by 10%.
Invoke a bubble of warped time and space for 8 seconds, reducing enemy attack speed by 20% and movement speed by 60%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.
Ranged and melee attackers are shocked for 70% weapon damage as Lightning.
Reduce the Arcane Power cost of all Skills by 3 while Storm Armor is active.
Increase the damage of the shock to 130% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increase your movement speed by 25% for 3 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attacks.
Whenever you cause a Critical Hit, you have a chance to electrocute a nearby enemy for 35% weapon damage as Lightning.

Bathe yourself in electrical energy, periodically shocking a nearby enemy for 100% weapon damage as Lightning. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Reduces the casting cost to 10 Arcane Power.
Explosive Blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2.5 seconds for 315% weapon damage as Physical.
Immediately release the energy of Explosive Blast for 225% weapon damage as Physical.
Increases the explosion radius to 18 yards for 225% weapon damage as Physical.
A chain of 3 consecutive explosions cascade off you, each causing 97% weapon damage as Physical.
Gather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 1.5 seconds, causing 225% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies within 12 yards.
Attacks have a chance to cause lightning to arc to 3 nearby enemies, dealing 10% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increases the damage bonus of Magic Weapon to 15% damage, and gives up to a 2% chance to Knockback any enemies hit.
Attacks have a chance to restore 1 Arcane Power.
Attacks poison enemies, dealing 15% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
Attacks recover 1.5% of damage caused as Life.
Imbue your weapon with magical energy, granting it 10% increased damage. Lasts 5 minutes.
Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies.
When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 44% weapon damage as Arcane.
Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 395% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 8 yards.
The beam fractures into a short-ranged cone that deals 196% weapon damage as Arcane.
Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 221% weapon damage as Arcane.
Thrust a beam of pure energy forward, dealing 170% weapon damage as Arcane and disintegrating enemies it kills.
Summon an Arcane Hydra that spits Arcane Orbs, which explode on impact, causing 60% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies near the explosion.
Summon a Lightning Hydra that electrocutes enemies for 64% weapon damage as Lightning.
Summon a poison breathing Hydra that leaves a pool of acid that causes 18% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the pool.
Summon a Frost Hydra that breathes a short range cone of frost, causing 36% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the cone.
Summon a Mammoth Hydra that breathes a river of flame at nearby enemies, dealing 67% weapon damage per second as Fire to enemies caught on the burning ground.
Summon a multi-headed Hydra for 15 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 28% weapon damage as Fire. You may only have one Hydra active at a time.
Summon a fiery Familiar that increases the damage of all attacks by 12% while Familiar is active.
While the Familiar is active, you regenerate 310 Life per second.
Summon a protective Familiar. When you are below 50% Life the Familiar will fully absorb damage from 1 attack every 6 seconds.
While the Familiar is active you, regenerate 2 Arcane Power per second.
The Familiar's projectiles explode on impact dealing 20% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 6 yards.
Summon a companion that will attack your targets for 20% weapon damage as Arcane. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies and lasts for 5 minutes.
For 4 seconds after you Teleport, you will take 30% less damage.
After casting Teleport, there is a 1 second delay before the cooldown begins, allowing you to Teleport again.
Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly bring you back to your original location.
Summon 2 decoys for 8 seconds after Teleporting.
Casts a low power Wave of Force upon arrival, dealing 265% weapon damage as Physical to all nearby enemies.
Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.
Increases the damage of the Meteor impact to 390% weapon damage as Fire and the molten fire to 90% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Reduce casting cost to 35 Arcane Power.
Unleash a volley of 7 smaller Meteors that each strike for 104% weapon damage as Fire.
Transforms the Meteor to ice that deals 312% weapon damage as Cold. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that deals 72% weapon damage as Cold and Slows enemy movement by 60% over 3 seconds.
If the initial impact of the Meteor causes a Critical Hit, the molten fire duration is increased to 8 seconds.

Summon an immense Meteor that plummets from the sky, causing 260% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that deals 60% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Increases the Life of your images to 100% of your Life.
Summon 5 Mirror Images that have 25% of your Life each.
When a Mirror Image is destroyed, it explodes, doing 45% weapon damage as Physical and has a 50% chance to Stun for 2 seconds.
The duration of your Mirror Images is increased to 10 seconds and their Life is increased to 29% of your Life.
Spells cast by your Mirror Images will do 10% of the damage of your own spells.
Summon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 7 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.
After the Blizzard ends, the ground is covered in a low lying mist for 3 seconds that Slows the movement speed of enemies by 60%.
Enemies caught in the storm have a 20% chance to be frozen for 3 seconds.
Reduce the casting cost to 20 Arcane Power.
Increases the size of Blizzard to cover 22 yards, dealing 210% weapon damage as Cold over 6 seconds.
Increases the duration of Blizzard to deal 280% weapon damage as Cold over 8 seconds.
Call down shards of ice to pelt an area, dealing 210% weapon damage as Cold to all enemies in the area over 6 seconds. Multiple casts in the same area do not stack.
You have a chance to gain 4 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by a ranged or melee attack.
Also increases your chance to critical hit by 5% while Energy Armor is active.
Rather than decreasing your maximum Arcane Power, Energy Armor increases it by 20 while it is active.
While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 35% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 35% of your maximum Life instead.
Increases all of your resistances by 25% while Energy Armor is active.

Focus your energies, increasing your Armor by 35% but decreasing your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
An explosion erupts around you when you transform causing 1600% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 15 yards.
Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 10 seconds.
Decrease the cooldown of Archon to 100 seconds.
Archon form can now cast Slow Time that lasts for 15 seconds.
Increase damage of all Archon abilities by 25%.

Transform into a being of pure Arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form, your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your Armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 second to the duration of Archon.
